channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SSH Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SSH Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-30957|2024-08-03T07:03:39.880Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SSH Plugin 2.6.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials IDs of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-30958|2024-08-03T07:03:39.918Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SSH Plugin 2.6.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-30959|2024-08-03T07:03:39.400Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ssh%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SSH Plugin 2.6.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified SSH server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
